issue.title: [CF 1453] Golganneth's Vitality trinket proc resets Last ability used condition
issue.body:
Golganneth's Vitality

proc: Ravaging Storm

 

Noticed on my monk with blackout kick, testing on the dummy. Whenever the proc was up, blackout kick showed up again after being used.

Is there a way to blacklist spells / abilities? I'd like to ignore interrupts..


> Posted by CurseForge user feherandor | Imported from CurseForge issue #1453 | Raw

comments.body:
realised it can ignored


> Posted by CurseForge user feherandor
